content: klose knit s 102 cowl pattern materials repeat lace section one skein of malabrigo chunky keep following this pattern until you have used up all the yarn if you want the cowl size us 13 and us 10 5 circular needles a little more closed to the neck use size darning needle 10 5 needles instead of size 13 stitch markers voila your cowl is complete abbreviations co cast on sts stitches k2tog knit 2 together instructions using a long tail cast on co 60sts connect in the round garter stitch in the round for the first section do 6 row of garter stitch in the round one row knit one row purl for the lace section knit 3 rounds on the next round *knit one yarn over k2tog* continue * to * until the end of the row then knit another three row repeat garter stitch for 6 row
